author: Kan Ting Chiu J (delivering the judgment of the court):
casename: Teng Fuh Holdings Pte Ltd v Collector of Land Revenue
coram: Kan Ting Chiu J; Judith Prakash J; Tan Lee Meng J
counsel: Tan Kay Kheng and Aw Charmian (Wong Partnership) for the appellant; Eric Chin (Attorney-General's Chambers) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Administrative Law/Remedies/Certiorari and mandamus/Whether application for leave for order of certiorari and mandamus made out of time/When three-month period under O 53 r 1(6) of Rules of Court commencing/Whether sufficient grounds for leave for order of certiorari and mandamus to be granted under O 53 r 1(1) of Rules of Court existing/Order 53 r 1 Rules of Court (Cap 322, R 5, 2004 Rev Ed)
